oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Diferrocenyl diselenides: excellent thiol peroxidase-like antioxidants
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MUGESH, G
PANDA, A
SINGH, HB
PUNEKAR, NS
BUTCHER, RJ
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: active organoselenium compound
glutathione-peroxidase
pz-51 ebselen
derivatives
model
tellurides
selenium
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Synthesis, structure and thiol peroxidase-like antioxidant activity of several diaryl diselenides having intramolecularly coordinating amino groups are described; the diselenides having both tertiary amino groups and redox-active ferrocenyl units show excellent peroxidase activity.
